prompt: Design a dark-themed loading page with a sleek, modern aesthetic. The background should be a deep charcoal gray (0xFF121212). At the center, place a circular progress indicator with a bright teal color (0xFF26A69A). Above the indicator, include a bold 'Please Wait' text in white (0xFFFFFFFF) with a font size of 20px, positioned 16 pixels above the indicator. Use a Column widget within a Scaffold, ensuring the content is vertically centered. Add a subtle fade-in animation for the text to enhance the user experience.
